attributes.title: Blizzard's Fine! Stop Over-Reacting - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "We're tube lords! You can't boo us!"
attributes.description:
Don't go chugging that bottle of bleach just yet, guys. We're pretty sure Blizzard is going to be just fine. This week the gang lays out why the gaming giant will survive their recent little financial stumble, plus gives their picks for the most underrated games of 2018!

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/charalanahzard
https://twitter.com/sirlarr
https://twitter.com/adamkovic
https://twitter.com/brucegreene

Tshirts n stuff: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/funhaus

SOURCES:
[CNBC] Activision Blizzard falls 10 percent after reporting decline in monthly active users - https://goo.gl/MMYrfy
[CNBC] Activision Blizzard holiday-quarter forecasts miss estimates - https://goo.gl/zFvCHb
[PC Gamer] Heroes of the Storm pros furious over Blizzard's decision to discontinue HGC - https://goo.gl/m1KS7G
[News.Blizzard] Heroes of the Storm News... - https://goo.gl/XGvomG
[Gamasutra] 100 support staff take cash offer and voluntarily leave Blizzard - https://goo.gl/6GqoaV
[Eurogamer] Blizzard customer service concern as staff accept cash to exit Irish hub - https://goo.gl/5oUEFS
[CNBC] Activision Blizzard says it plans to fire its CFO for an unspecified cause - https://goo.gl/131QgV

Thanks to the following channel for gameplay footage:
SNES Longplay [245] The Death and Return of Superman - https://goo.gl/3csV3w
attributes.display_title: Blizzard's Fine! Stop Over-Reacting - Gaming Weekly

attributes.title: Alien Isolation 2 just got Blizzard-ed - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "Blizzard didn't make him gay!"
attributes.description:
This week the gang talks about the continued demise Steam and why mobile games of your favorites franchises aren't as bad as you think. Also a laptop with Lawrence's voice reads a bunch of your reasons for hating Blizzard.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat 11 New Fatalities, Brutalities, Gameplay! - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "I recognize that crotch anywhere."
attributes.description:
#EarlyAccessProvidedByWB

Go to http://mackweldon.com and get 20% off using promo code “GAMINGWEEKLY20”

This week the boys traveled to faraway exotic Silver Lake, CA to play Mortal Kombat 11 and brought back all the spine-ripping, blood-axe-slashing, and sand-fisting gameplay footage you can handle!

attributes.title: Resident Evil 2’s Biggest Problem - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "What about Paul Reiser?"
attributes.description:
This week the gang brings you gameplay reviews of Resident Evil 2, Alien: Blackout, and as much information about Dreams as they can give you without Playstation execs kicking in our door and tossing us into an active volcano.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: Anthem Literally Broke Our PCs - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "Bruce does not have hepatitis."
attributes.description:
This week the gang talks about the beautiful, nonsensical, madness of Kingdom Hearts 3, the nearly unplayable Anthem demo, even more Steam drama, and finally some real news about the ever mysterious Dreams.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: Government Wants to Censor Violent Games - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "It's racist but you're not wrong."
attributes.description:
This week the gang discusses Apex Legends' insane Twitch dominance and Pennsylvania's pointless new taxes on mature video games. Plus Lawrence screams at you about how games don't make you violent and foreign people scream at us about our coverage of the global gaming scene.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: Rooster Teeth Saved Inside Gaming! - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "You can't creampie with a sixty-nine."
attributes.description:
Holy crap, they really did it! Rooster Teeth is bringing you all new episodes of Inside Gaming! Plus Larr smuggled all the classic episodes out the Machinima vault in his prison wallet. Plus we have reviews of Far Cry New Dawn, Crackdown 3, Jump Force, and the latest news from Nintendo Direct! Jesus, I'm exhausted.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: Apex Legends is Changing Multiplayer Forever - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "We're into scat now."
attributes.description:
This week the gang tells you why Apex Legends is our favorite battle royale game ever! Plus, they try to figure out if Overkill's Walking Dead game is actually cancelled or not, and Lawrence answers the question all you creepos have been asking: Where have all the boobies gone?

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: The Best New Pokémon is a Depressed Lizard - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "There were eggs vaguely nearby."
attributes.description:
Hold on to your Blimbleblorps and Flurminnzarrs 'cuz there's all new Pokemon news coming at you hard! Plus, the gang reviews Metro Exodus, and tries to figure out what the hell THQ Nordic was thinking when they went mucking around in the dark web. 

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: People Are Gross - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "Lawrence, talk about the pretty boys!"
attributes.description:
This week the gang almost gives up on humanity as they are forced to report on the "Rape Day" game scandal. Again. Plus, far more lighthearted looks at Devil May Cry 5 and whatever the hell Nintendo Switch's new LABO VR project is.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: Google Will Spy on Your Gaming - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "Yetis are cute!"
attributes.description:
This week the gang discusses Google's mysterious upcoming foray into the gaming world. Is it a new console? A new controller? Or just another way to find out what you're beating off to? Plus, we figure out if Brendan Greene is really leaving PUBG, and Lawrence updates you on the new straight to video DOOM movie for some reason.

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: Is Sekiro Too Easy Compared to Dark Souls? - Gaming Weekly
attributes.caption: "... just grab both their asses!"
attributes.description:
This week the gang discusses the beautiful but exhausting Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, all your favorite Halo games coming to PC, and Alanah's review of Tom Clancy's The Division 2. Long story short: It's even more "Clancier" than the first one.



Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 

https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly
